# archestra_user_role_assignment (Resource)

Archestra User Role Assignment

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "archestra_user_role_assignment" "example" {
  user_id = archestra_user.example.id
  role_id = archestra_role.example.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role_id` (String) ID of the role to assign
- `user_id` (String) ID of the user to assign the role to

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Role assignment identifier
